name: PsychicMindReader
0:
”Alexa, start mind reader”
”Alexa open mind reader”
”Alexa launch mind reader”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mind reader
des:
Trick your friends by making Alexa read your mind! Have them write down a number, and then ask the Psychic Mind Reader to tell you what it is. The trick is: you ask the question with a sentence that uses code words to tell Alexa what your number is!

 i: 1
 go: 2
 can: 3
 look: 4
 please: 5
 will: 6
 quick: 7
 then: 8
 now: 9
 favor: 0
 next: repeat the last number

So, if you want it to guess "9455", you would ask, "Now, look into my mind, please, and tell me what you see next". Magic!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
